ValidationRule.description: If the Selenium Test Group has an Environment, the Environment of the Credential must match the Group's Environment.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( copado__Selenium_Test_Group__r.copado__Environment__c ) ) , copado__Selenium_Test_Group__r.copado__Environment__c != copado__Org_Credential__r.copado__Environment__c), true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Selenium Test Group Environment must equal the Credential Environment.
